org.jooq
Interface Result<R extends Record>

All Superinterfaces:
FieldProvider, java.lang.Iterable<R>
public interface Result<R extends Record>
extends FieldProvider, java.lang.Iterable<R>

A wrapper for database results returned by SelectQuery

Author:
Lukas Eder
See Also:
Select.getResult()

getValues
